summary: The Knight Arn is sent on a last mission against Saladin. He has to win this battle, before he can go home to Sweden, and finally marry his Cecilia and start a family. But the peace back home is threatened by the Danes.
cast: Joakim Nätterqvist|Sofia Helin|Stellan Skarsgård|Bibi Andersson|Gustaf Skarsgård|Fanny Risberg|Joel Kinnaman|Jakob Cedergren|Morgan Alling|Anders Baasmo Christiansen|Nicholas Boulton|Frank Sieckel|Barnaby Kay|Robert Willox|Martin Wallström|Nijas Ørnbak-Fjeldmose|Bill Skarsgård|Göran Ragnerstam|Driss Roukhe|Zakaria Atifi|Elise Pärnänen|Valter Skarsgård|Mohamed Tsouli|Anton Näslund|Linus Hanson Högberg|Sven-Bertil Taube|Milind Soman|Tord Sandström-Fahström|Magnus Sorensen|Josef Cahoon|Laban Eliasson|Annika Hallin|Svante Hildesson|Callum Mitchell|Chems-Eddine Zinoune
title: Arn: Riket vid vägens slut
